text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Hackers attack Church of Scientology website
text.summary: Following the removal of a promotional video featuring Scientologist Tom Cruise from YouTube at the request of the Church of Scientology, hackers attacked the Scientology.org website, making it inaccessible for a number of days in January 2008.
